Receive Analytics reports periodically i: Receive Analytics reports periodically in email.
This option cannot be changed since your: This option cannot be changed since your theme has added the support for Rank Math Breadcrumbs using: %s
Are you sure you want to disconnect Goog: Are you sure you want to disconnect Google services from your site?
If nothing similar is found, this behavi: If nothing similar is found, this behaviour will be applied. Note: If the requested URL ends with /login, /admin, or /dashboard, WordPress will automatically redirect to respective locations within the WordPress admin area.
Proudly display the calculated SEO Score: Proudly display the calculated SEO Score as a badge on the front end. It can be disabled for specific posts in the post editor.
You have not given the permission to fet: You have not given the permission to fetch this data. Please reconnect with all required permissions.
Google AdSense support is only available: Google AdSense support is only available in Rank Math Pro's Advanced Analytics module.
Enable this option only if you are not u: Enable this option only if you are not using any other plugin/theme to install Google Analytics code.
Automatically submit sitemaps to the Goo: Automatically submit sitemaps to the Google Search Console
Benefits of Connecting Rank Math Account: Benefits of Connecting Rank Math Account
Easily set up Google Analytics without u: Easily set up Google Analytics without using another 3rd party plugin
Free keyword suggestions when entering a: Free keyword suggestions when entering a focus keyword
Learn more about the benefits of connect: Learn more about the benefits of connecting your account here.
Track page and keyword rankings with the: Track page and keyword rankings with the Advanced Analytics module
Use our revolutionary SEO Analyzer to sc: Use our revolutionary SEO Analyser to scan your website for SEO errors
Verify site ownership on Google Search C: Verify site ownership on Google Search Console in a single click
WordPress Dashboard > Settings > Permali: WordPress Dashboard > Settings > Permalinks > Product permalinks Example: default: /product/accessories/action-figures/acme/ - becomes: /accessories/action-figures/acme/
Remove prefix like %1$s from product URL: Remove the prefix like %1$s from the product URL chosen at %2$s
If you are showing the SEO scores on the: If you are showing the SEO scores on the front end, this option will insert a %1$s backlink to RankMath.com to show your support. You can change the link and the text by using this %2$s.
Remove Schema Markup on Shop Archives: Remove Schema Markup on Shop Archives
Remove Schema Markup Data from WooCommer: Remove Schema Markup Data from WooCommerce Shop archive pages.
the robots.txt file is not writable.
<strong>Warning:<\/strong> your site's s: Warning: your site's search engine visibility is set to Hidden in Settings > Reading. This means that the changes you make here will not take effect. Set the search engine visibility to Public to be able to change the robots.txt content.
Select Product Brand Taxonomy to use in: Select the Product Brand Taxonomy to use in Schema.org & OpenGraph markup.
Display the badges automatically, or ins: Display the badges automatically, or insert the %1$s shortcode in your posts and the %2$s template tag in your theme template files.
Change the styling for the front end SEO: Change the styling for the front end SEO score badge.
Link to use for homepage (first item) in: Link to use for the homepage (first item) in breadcrumbs.
Automatically add <code>rel=\"nofollow\": Automatically add the rel="nofollow" attribute for links pointing to external image files. The attribute is dynamically applied when the content is displayed, and the stored content is not changed.

Automatically add the rel="nofollow" attribute for external links appearing in your posts, pages, and other post types. The attribute is dynamically applied when the content is displayed, and the stored content is not changed.
Open External Links in New Tab\/Window: Open External Links in a New Tab/Window
If you have hundreds of 404 errors, your: If you have hundreds of 404 errors, your error log might increase quickly. Only choose this option if you have very few 404s and are unable to replicate the 404 error on a particular URL from your end.
The Simple mode only logs URI and access: The Simple mode only logs URI and access time, while the Advanced mode creates detailed logs including additional information such as the Referrer URL.
Sets the max number of rows in a log. Se: Sets the maximum number of rows in a log. Set to 0 to disable the limit.
Enter URIs or keywords you wish to preve: Enter URIs or keywords you wish to prevent from getting logged by the 404 monitor.
Turn ON to ignore all query parameters (: Turn ON to ignore all query parameters (the part after a question mark in a URL) when logging 404 errors.
Extend the functionality of WordPress by: Extend the functionality of WordPress by creating redirects in our plugin when you change the slug of a post, page, category or CPT. You can modify the redirection further according to your needs.
Remove parent slugs from the category URL.
Format the label used for archive pages.
Format the label used for search results: Format the label used for the search results pages.
Label used for 404 error item in breadcr: Label used for 404 error item in breadcrumbs.
Add <code>TITLE<\/code> attribute for al: Add TITLE attribute for all images without a TITLE attribute automatically. The attribute is dynamically applied when the content is displayed, and the stored content is not changed.
Format used for the new <code>title<\/co: Format used for the new title attribute values.
Remove \/category\/ from category archiv:
Remove /category/ from category archive URLs. %s
E.g. example.com/category/my-category/ becomes example.com/my-category
Display the Debug Console instead of bei: Display the Debug Console instead of being redirected. Administrators only.
If category is a child category, show al: If the category is a child category, show all ancestor categories.
I understand the risks and I want to edi: I understand the risks and I want to edit the file
Add <code>alt<\/code> attributes for <co: Add alt attributes for images without alt attributes automatically. The attribute is dynamically applied when the content is displayed, and the stored content is not changed.
Be careful when editing the htaccess fil: Be careful when editing the .htaccess file, it is easy to make mistakes and break your site. If that happens, you can restore the file to its state before the last edit by replacing the .htaccess file with the backup copy created by Rank Math in the same directory (.htaccess_back_xxxxxx), using an FTP client.
Format used for the new <code>alt<\/code: The format used for the new alt attribute values.
Automatically add <code>target=\"_blank\: Automatically add target="_blank" attribute for external links appearing in your posts, pages, and other post types to make them open in a new browser tab or window. The attribute is dynamically applied when the content is displayed, and the stored content is not changed.
Add content before each post in your sit: Add content before each post in your site feeds.
Add content after each post in your site: Add content after each post in your site feeds.
Enter your Bing Webmaster Tools verifica: Enter your Bing Webmaster Tools verification HTML code or ID. Get it here: %s
Remove WooCommerce generator tag from th: Remove the WooCommerce generator tag from the source code.
Turning off breadcrumbs will hide breadc: Turning off breadcrumbs will hide breadcrumbs inserted in template files too.
Separator character or string that appea: Separator character or string that appears between breadcrumb items.
Display the homepage breadcrumb in the trail.
Label used for homepage link (first item: Label used for the homepage link (first item) in breadcrumbs.
A link to the archive for the post autho: A link to the archive for the post author, with the author's name as anchor text.
A link to the post, with the title as an: A link to the post, with the title as anchor text.
A link to your site, with your site's na: A link to your site, with your site's name as anchor text.
A link to your site, with your site's name and description as anchor text.
Redirect all attachment page URLs to the: Redirect all attachment page URLs to the post they appear in. For more advanced redirection control, use the built-in %s.
Redirect attachments without a parent po: Redirect attachments without a parent post to this URL. Leave empty for no redirection.
Only add <code>nofollow<\/code> attribut: Only add a nofollow attribute for the link if the target domain is in this list. Add one per line. Leave empty to apply nofollow for ALL external domains.
The <code>nofollow<\/code> attribute <st: The nofollow attribute will not be added for the link if the target domain is in this list. Add one per line.
Leave the field empty to let WordPress h: Leave the field empty to let WordPress handle the contents dynamically. If an actual robots.txt file is present in the root folder of your site, this option won't take effect and you have to edit the file directly, or delete it and then edit from here.
Enter your Yandex verification HTML code: Enter your Yandex verification HTML code or ID. Learn how to get it: %s
Enter your Pinterest verification HTML c: Enter your Pinterest verification HTML code or ID. Learn how to get it: %s
Contents are locked because a robots.txt: Contents are locked because a robots.txt file is present in the root folder.
